Literature.Title: Innate immunity. Isolation of several cysteine-rich antimicrobial peptides from the blood of a mollusc, Mytilus edulis.
Literature.Author: Charlet M, Chernysh S, Philippe H, Hetru C, Hoffmann JA, Bulet P

Literature.Title: Trypanocidal and leishmanicidal activities of different antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) isolated from aquatic animals.
Literature.Author: Löfgren SE, Miletti LC, Steindel M, Bachère E, Barracco MA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=6.2 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus(MIC=0.5-1µM),Aerococcus viridans(MIC=0.5-1µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=0.5-1µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=4-40µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1-2µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=1-2µM),Escherichia coli D22(MIC=1-2µM),Escherichia coli 1106(MIC=1-2µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=2-4µM),Pseudoalteromonas carrageenovora ATCC 43555(MIC=5-10µM),Pseudomonas alginovora(MIC=10-20µM),Cytophaga drobachiensis(MIC=5-10µM),Trypanosoma cruzi(LD50=64.8µM)
